item.description:
To make things a little easier for the non-Somerville people (myself included... hee hee) I am going to schedule the occasional non-Davis Sq meet-up.

I spent yesterday looking at places, but as bookstores are inappropriate, I kept my search to bars, pubs, and coffeehouses. Not many coffeehouses in the area, most of the restaurants here are small Italian places with tables that seat 2-4 and high prices.

So that limits us to pubs, and from there, to Tuesdays and Mondays so we can avoid bands and crowds.

So this Monday, I am proposing a game night at Hennessey's on Union Street
item.name: Game Night - Haymarket
